freyja3.name: Freyja
freyja3.title: Parallel Hearts
freyja3.description: Freyja, the queen of Dökkálfheimr, the realm of nightmares, and her past self, Eitr. Together, with parallel heartbeats, they join the harvest festival.
freyja3.duo:
Neutralizes two【Bonus】effects, excluding stat bonuses and inflicts【Frozen】and 【Discord】on foes within 5 rows or 5 columns centered on unit (neutralizes the first applicable 【Bonus】effects on foe's list of active effects).
(Duo Skills can be used once per map by tapping the Duo button. Duo Skills cannot be used by units deployed using
Pair Up
.)
【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill like Rally or Hone and positive status effects (extra movement or effects like Dominance).
【Frozen】
Reduces inflicted unit's follow-up ability and increases foe's follow-up ability through unit's next action:
Increases Spd difference necessary for unit to make a follow-up attack by X and decreases Spd difference necessary for foe to make a follow-up attack by X during combat (if foe's Def > unit's Def, X = 10 + difference between Def stats × 2; otherwise, X = 10). (For example, if Spd difference necessary increases by 10, Spd must be ≥ 15 more than foe's Spd to make a follow-up attack; stacks with similar skills.)
【Discord】
Inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-X on unit during combat (X = 2 + number of allies within 2 spaces of unit; max 5) through its next action.

Castle Hall: **Freyja:** Eitr is me as a child... Seeing her is like seeing my shame on full display.
**Eitr:** I come from a world of nothingness. But here... This place is so bright and full of smiles.
**Freyja:** The mortals here look truly content. I am sure my brother would be happy to see this harvest festival...
**Eitr:** I am too scared to do this alone... But if someone's with me, then maybe I can...
**Freyja:** That costume looks great on you, Eitr. Now, try to trick someone.
Visit: **Eitr:** U-um... I'm Eitr. I came to tell you about the harvest festival at [F]'s. O-OK, bye!
Level: **Eitr:** Trick or treat! *sigh* I said it!
**Freyja:** As I expected, your options are trick or treat. What will you choose?
Summon: I am Freyja, ruler of Dökkálfheimr. Hold your head up, Eitr, like me. You are certainly capable of at least that.
Learn Skill: **Eitr:** Uh, are you sure? No one has ever been so nice to me... Thank you.
Confession:
**Eitr:** At first, all I noticed at the harvest festival were how many people there were... I was so scared...
But everyone was kind to me. And I was able to say "thank you" to lots of people. So, um...
**Freyja:** What is it? If you have something to say, speak up.
**Eitr:** Y-yes. I wanted to be sure to tell you something...
Thank you for staying with me. I hope that future me turns out just like you someday...
Status: Ugh.
"How can you expect to scare them when you yourself tremble in fear?" "I... I... *sob*"
Conversation: **Eitr:** *sob* I'm scared... There are so many people here...
**Freyja:** It is a festival, after all. How long do you intend on cowering?
It doesn't matter if I wear a costume or not, one look at me and people would be surprised...
But then they'd just make fun of me... *sob*
**Freyja:** You cannot cry with your mouth full. Now, eat up.
**Eitr:** Oh... All right. Freyr gave me treats too when I was sad...
**Freyja:** Yes, I know. I am you. However, I know more about the world than you.
I know it is filled with more than just ill intent and prejudice. Such was the reason Freyr cared for mortals.
**Eitr:** Really? I guess...you're right. There are some mortals I have encountered who were kind.
**Freyja:** Perhaps back then, what I... No, what you lacked was courage...
The courage to believe in mortals, and even in Freyr.
It would be foolish to keep repeating the same mistake. Now, muster up your courage.
**Eitr:** Yes... I will try believing in Freyr and... in mortals too.
**Freyja:** That is the me I know. Now, shall we join the festivities?

nerthuz4.name: Nerþuz
nerthuz4.title: Divine Abundance
nerthuz4.description: A goddess of Vanaheimr, the realm of light. She celebrates the harvest alongside mortals as the goddess of the land.

Castle Hall: I feel the gratitude of all you sweet little mortals. I am certain the land will continue to grant your wishes.
The land supports many lives. Let us head toward the future together, and always remain grateful for its bounty.
Revel in the harvest-festival joy while you can, but winter will soon come... Do not neglect your preparations.
I am happy to receive treats, but it would be deliciously fun to trick some of these adorable mortals too.
Well, does this suit me? I tried to fit the mood of the festival. Mortals do make the most interesting outfits.
Visit:
I am Nerþuz, goddess of the land.
There is a festival to give thanks for the land's blessings going on at the castle of [F].
Level: The land's blessings help to build the future. I pray that this abundance can continue eternally.
The smiles of these darling mortals are quite infectious!
Neither gods nor humans can truly thrive apart from the land.
Summon: I am Nerþuz, goddess of Vanaheimr, here to offer gratitude for the harvest alongside all the precious mortals.
Learn Skill: This is to celebrate the blessings of Askr's land... I will gratefully accept the thoughtfulness of these mortals.
Confession:
I am enjoying myself at this wonderful harvest festival. Thank you for inviting me, [S].
As a goddess who presides over the land, I know how important it is to all its inhabitants.
People spread their roots into it, and live upon it, fueled by its bounty as they forge their history.
If they do not forget to show their gratitude, the land will sustain them with its gifts for all of eternity.
I also watch over them, to ensure their world continues to be filled with abundance, so...
please call me for the next harvest festival. The smiles of all the adorable mortals fill my heart to bursting!
Status: If they're offering thanks for the blessings of the land, do you suppose they'll thank me as well?
*startle* Please don't play pranks on me. Here, you can have some treats...
Mortals come up with the most adorable ideas. Imagine, dressing up in costumes for a festival...
Do you enjoy treats? Please, eat as many as you like.
When I see creatures of the land, I want to give them all the blessings there are to give.
Dressing up in costumes makes these precious mortals even more adorable. I am truly delighted.
Oh my, you have a treat stuck to your cheek... That's so cute. Hold still, I'll remove it for you.

peony4.name: Peony
peony4.title: Fruitful Dream
peony4.description: A ljósálfr from Ljósálfheimr, the realm of dreams. She dreams of blissful abundance alongside mortals at the harvest festival.

Castle Hall: Pumpkins on the left! Pumpkins on the right! Pumpkins everywhere! How fun! It's like being in a dream.
I feel like there was a time when I was always hungry... I hope everyone gets a full belly at the harvest festival.
What a wonderful festival! It would be a waste not to enjoy it to the fullest. I'm going to wake up Mirabilis!
Lady Freyja and Eitr both have such adorable outfits! I wonder if they're enjoying the harvest festival.
Isn't my festival outfit wonderful?! I'm going to play lots of tricks in it!
Visit: My name's Peony. I'm a ljósálfr from Ljósálfheimr. There's a fun festival at [F]'s castle!
Level: My dream is for fun, festive days like this one to go on and on!
Trick or treat! I'm sure this will be fun either way!
Hm... I wonder if I got a little too carried away.
Summon: I'm Peony, the Sweet Dream. This festival gives thanks for the harvest, right?! Let's make it like a fun dream!
Learn Skill: Is this a portion of the blessings of the land that you're sharing? Thank you! I'll take really good care of it!
Confession:
Trick or treat, Summoner! Will you give me a treat? Or would you prefer a trick?
The harvest festival is so fun! I wish it could go on and on.
It looks like I'm not the only one who feels that way. Everyone dreams of these fun days lasting forever.
After a festival ends, they all go on living their lives, looking forward to the next one.
Dreams continue unending. Isn't that why we're here? To safeguard that bounty of happiness!
I'm going to make the most of the best festival ever, and harvest lots of lots of dreams and joy!
Status: Oooooo! *giggle*
Surprised?
Have some treats!
I adore festivals! I was so excited yesterday I couldn't even dream of falling asleep.
What do you think of this outfit? It's really cute, don't you agree?
I love how the whole town is shining like Ljósálfheimr. It's just so pretty...
Tonight's dreams will be sweet as candy for sure.
Going to a festival with you is like a really good dream. If only I didn't have to wake up...

skrimir.name: Skrimir
skrimir.title: Echoing Howl
skrimir.description: A member of a laguz tribe and viewed as the heir to Caineghis, Gallia's king. With no prior knowledge of the harvest festival, he's here alongside Ranulf. Appears in Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn.

Castle Hall: Trick or treat? Is that some kind of sorcery?! Show me the enemy!
Ranulf thinks I look down on the beorc too much.
When Ranulf isn't around, people turn to me with their troubles. So I decided to come with him.
You'll get soft and weak eating only treats! Eat meat, gnaw some bones, and become a warrior like me!
How are you training soldiers during the festival? I'll be training morning, afternoon, and evening, like always.
Visit: I'm Skrimir, general of Gallia. I'm in command at the harvest festival at [F]'s castle!
Level: I've been waiting for this! I won't give out treats for free. Wrestle me with all you've got!
Yah! Hah! I'm starting to enjoy this! Come at me some more!
Grr... How pathetic of me, a general of Gallia! Here, take these treats!
Summon: I'm Skrimir! It's finally time to get this festival going. I'll show everyone the strength of the beast tribe!
Learn Skill: Are you trying to get on my good side? You're a smart one!
Confession:
Hmph, such a lighthearted affair! They've combined a ritual to praise the land with lots of fun and games.
A warrior's festival has combat! Tests of strength with fist and claw! That is how a beast tribe's festival should be.
We laguz are always part of the land. All of this just to show their gratitude to it... Typical beorc insolence!
The festival food's good though! I bet that's why Ranulf was so eager to get here. He wanted to feast!
Food is the land's blessing. Digging into it with gusto shows gratitude. I'll eat and eat, then eat some more!
Don't hold back to be polite. Join me! We should enjoy the blessings of the day, [S]!
Status: They call this a harvest festival costume! It suits me!
*startle* Hm. I can't believe you caught me by surprise.
Giving thanks to the land for its bounty... Commendable.
Is it only treats? No meat? Meat! Meat! Hand over some meat!
My uncle, the king, ought to see me in this outfit.
Laguz and beorc are enjoying the festival together... Not a bad thing.
All right! Time for you to go scare everyone too. Let's move!
Map Select: Let's see what they can do.

ranulf2.name: Ranulf
ranulf2.title: Considerate Gaze
ranulf2.description: A cat warrior from Gallia, the home of the beast tribe of laguz. He is considerate of others at the harvest festival, acting as Skrimir's assistant. Appears in Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn.

Castle Hall: I didn't expect Skrimir to come out at all. He has a tendency to go berserk, so I'm here to keep an eye on him.
So I hand out treats to the children? Sounds fun. I don't mind a few tricks if we're just playing around.
I find it very strange that Lethe, of all people, enjoys this festival. Is she just playing the cool cat here?
The harvest festival, eh? Lethe was fond of it, so I decided to come check it out for myself.
I'm not that good at dressing up, but participating in a country's cultural events can help build understanding.
Visit: I'm here to share portions from the harvest festival. You can give your thanks to [F].
Level: A festival to recognize the blessings of the earth. You know, this one kind of works for me.
What was it? Trick or treat, right? Well, then, let's have some fun.
I'm not sure I get how this works yet, so let me know if I make a mistake!
Summon:
I hear you took good care of Lethe. I'm Ranulf...
Actually, formal self-introductions are boring. It's a festival! Let's make this more exciting!
Learn Skill: You're sure you want me to have this? All right. Thanks.
Confession:
I'm surprised Skrimir is attending the festival. The general can be forceful and direct, like how Ike used to be.
He has the capacity to be a good heir to the king of the lions, but his views are narrow. This is good for him.
Not every beorc is an enemy. We're not all that different, especially in the unbiased hearts of our children.
I have felt the warm spirit of order here.
I hope the division between laguz and beorc in my world gets resolved, but... Well, that will take a long time.
Anyway, I learned a lot here. Thank you for this, [S].
Status: Ahoy!
Look at this! I'm a pirate captain now! Well? What do you think?
Huh? W-w-wait, was that supposed to scare me? You've got a lot to learn.
Even if I dress up as something else, I'm not hiding my tail. You know that, right?
Me? A pirate? I typically prefer to keep my feet on the land.
Maybe Kyza and Lyre won't bicker if I have enough treats.
I get to eat delicious food and make a ruckus with my comrades? I think I like festivals.
I get the feeling the festival will be twice as fun with you.
